verbose_text: When cleaved by activated caspase-8 from the extrinsic pathway, Bid (once activated, referred to as t-Bid) causes a structural change to Bax making it similar to the structure of the anti-apoptotic molecule, Bcl-2, allowing Bax to translocate to the mitochondria.
evidence: Bid (once activated, referred to as t-Bid) causes a structural change to Bax
